issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
load an app that has been sitting for a week and it comes up with issues. It was sent to BETA with no issues. It decides to load its own emulator in 2.33 when I have min of 14 in the TIapp.

h3. Actual Result
wont run, gives me a attribute app id issues then crashes. This has gone on since adding updates to 3.1.2.

h3. Expected Result
Run the app on emulator.

comments.body:
Hello, 

from your diagnostics, you are using the wrong version of Java. 

Please read this:

http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/3.0/#!/guide/Prerequisites

Best,
Mauro
